price: (Nkͻmhyεni, wei yε) Nwoma a yɛasane ama woͻ, enti εmma w’akoma nha wo wͻ ho; sεdeε wode bεbͻ kͻkͻ, na ayε afutusεm anaa nkaekaeε ama agyidiefoͻ no.
arabic: كِتَٰبٌ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ فَلَا يَكُن فِي صَدۡرِكَ حَرَجٞ مِّنۡهُ لِتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: kitābun unzila ilayka falā yakun fī ṣadrika ḥarajun min'hu litundhira bihi wadhik'rā lil'mu'minīna
